1111011000110110 1100111110100000 1 -> sum: 1100010111010111, cout: 1

0110010111001111 0100000010001101 0 -> sum: 1010011001011100, cout: 0
0101110011001010 1010100000101110 0 -> sum: 0000010011111000, cout: 1
0110101000110011 1100101111100101 1 -> sum: 0011011000011001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
